The barren tree a sermon preached at Pauls crosse October 26. 1623 / by Tho. Adams. Adams, Thomas, fl. 1612-1653.
[6], 56 p.
Printed by Aug. Matheuues for Iohn Grismand, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Alley, at the signe of the Gunne, London : 1623.
Signatures: A4(-A1) B-H4. "Reissued as pt. 2 of STC 115"--STC (2nd ed). Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library (New York, N.Y.) and Cambridge University Library.
=======
